items.name: Pickaxe
items.description: A sturdy pickaxe, essential for breaking through rock and other obstacles.

help.about: A sturdy pickaxe, essential for breaking through rock and other obstacles.

items.name: Revolver
items.description: A reliable six-shooter, perfect for fending off subterranean threats.

help.about: A reliable six-shooter, perfect for fending off subterranean threats.

items.name: Pith Helmet
items.description: A lightweight helmet offering protection from falling debris and the occasional dripping stalactite.

help.about: A lightweight helmet offering protection from falling debris and the occasional dripping stalactite.

items.name: Goggles
items.description: Protective eyewear to shield against dust, spores, and unexpected geothermal vents.

help.about: Protective eyewear to shield against dust, spores, and unexpected geothermal vents.

items.name: Expedition Coat
items.description: A durable coat with numerous pockets, offering protection from the elements.

help.about: A durable coat with numerous pockets, offering protection from the elements.

items.name: Sturdy Boots
items.description: Reinforced boots designed for traversing treacherous underground terrain.

help.about: Reinforced boots designed for traversing treacherous underground terrain.

items.name: Laudanum
items.description: A tincture of opium, useful for dulling pain and steadying nerves.

help.about: A tincture of opium, useful for dulling pain and steadying nerves.

items.name: Dynamite
items.description: A stick of dynamite, capable of clearing large obstacles or dealing with groups of creatures.

help.about: A stick of dynamite, capable of clearing large obstacles or dealing with groups of creatures.

items.name: Lantern
items.description: A brass lantern that casts a steady, reliable light, pushing back the oppressive darkness.

help.about: A brass lantern that casts a steady, reliable light, pushing back the oppressive darkness.

items.name: Pocket Watch
items.description: An intricate pocket watch, its ticking a small comfort in the silent depths.

help.about: An intricate pocket watch, its ticking a small comfort in the silent depths.

items.name: Gear Ring
items.description: A ring fashioned from interlocking gears, humming with a faint mechanical energy.

help.about: A ring fashioned from interlocking gears, humming with a faint mechanical energy.

items.name: Cane Sword
items.description: An elegant walking cane concealing a slender, deadly blade.

help.about: An elegant walking cane concealing a slender, deadly blade.

items.name: Steam Drill
items.description: A marvel of modern engineering, this steam-powered drill can pulverize rock with astonishing speed.

help.about: A marvel of modern engineering, this steam-powered drill can pulverize rock with astonishing speed.

items.name: Harpoon Gun
items.description: A pneumatic gun that fires a heavy, tethered harpoon.

help.about: A pneumatic gun that fires a heavy, tethered harpoon.

items.name: Flare Gun
items.description: A pistol that fires a bright, burning flare, useful for signaling or temporarily blinding foes.

help.about: A pistol that fires a bright, burning flare, useful for signaling or temporarily blinding foes.

items.name: Mining Helmet
items.description: A sturdy helmet with a built-in carbide lamp.

help.about: A sturdy helmet with a built-in carbide lamp.

items.name: Boiler Suit
items.description: A one-piece garment of tough, heavy-duty cloth, offering full-body protection.

help.about: A one-piece garment of tough, heavy-duty cloth, offering full-body protection.

items.name: First-Aid Kit
items.description: A compact kit containing bandages, antiseptics, and other medical supplies.

help.about: A compact kit containing bandages, antiseptics, and other medical supplies.

items.name: Scroll
items.description: A scroll that can cast magic.

help.about: A scroll that can cast magic.

items.name: Rune
items.description: A rune that can cast magic.

help.about: A rune that can cast magic.

items.name: Water bottle
items.description: Bottled water.

help.about: Water in a bottle. Tasteless, but refreshing.

items.name: Ration
items.description: Prepared food in a can.

help.about: Prepared food in a can. Not exactly tasty, but better than going hungry.

items.name: Shiv
items.description: A crude, but effective, makeshift blade.

help.about: A crude, but effective, makeshift blade.

items.name: Scrap Metal
items.description: A piece of scrap metal, useful for crafting.

help.about: A piece of scrap metal, useful for crafting.

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: A small pouch of black powder.

help.about: A small pouch of black powder.

items.name: Bioluminescent Fungus
items.description: A glowing mushroom that emits a soft, ethereal light.

help.about: A glowing mushroom that emits a soft, ethereal light.

items.name: Tough Leather
items.description: A thick, durable piece of leather.

help.about: A thick, durable piece of leather.

items.name: Petrified Wood
items.description: A piece of wood that has turned to stone over time.

help.about: A piece of wood that has turned to stone over time.

items.name: Resonant Crystal
items.description: A crystal that hums with a strange energy.

help.about: A crystal that hums with a strange energy.

items.name: Junk
items.description: Seemingly useless junk.

help.about: You cannot quite make out what this junk could be used for.
